EmailTemplate.subject: EMS Billing: In-house vs. Outsource - join the conversation on July 19th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Complimentary Live Webinar
EMS Billing: In-House vs. Outsource What do I need to consider?
Join TriTech Software Systems and Page, Wolfberg and Wirth in a complimentary live webinar with PWW Director of Reimbursement Consulting, Steve Johnson, and TriTech Industry Education Coordinator, Kathy Ransom.Â Â
In this upcoming webinar, learn about issues to consider when evaluating whether to outsource your EMS Billing or bring it in-house, including:
-Control Issues -Financial Considerations -Liability and Accountability -Compliance -HIPAA and more.
Who Should Attend: -Billing supervisors/management -Operations management -EMS billers and coders
Tuesday, July 19, 2011 2pm ET | 1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11am PT
Approved for 1.0 NAAC CEU
REGISTER (please copy and paste the URL into your internet browser: http://offers.tritech.com/2011_7_19-webinar.html
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim RoadÂ lÂ San Diego, CA 92121
